Good Comments: Quality of subs alright, but AniYoshi is much better.
A Lot of the people speaking in the background were left untranslated
Hitode-Animess is much faster and quality of subs is superb. Much better than Aniyoshi. Aniyoshi is also very slow with their releases.
Bad Comments: Many background lines were left untranslated, the sub font and quality of translations leaves plenty to be desired.
Subs are good as they use TL notes, video can't complain. Only downside was annoying font colour other then that good 7/10.
